title: S14 Ep2: Under the Control of MK Ultra
itunes:title: Under the Control of MK Ultra
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS dives head first into the deep state and visits with a man named Randy, who was recruited by MK Ultra at a young age and exploited.

Randy's life was then infused with everything from illicit sex parties, to government assassinations, to encounters with aliens, and he has come to us to bravely share his stories!

Check out Randy's Facebook page with pictures and evidence of his time in MK Ultra here: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100009933761469
